subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: As American Pharoah’s connections look to bounce back from his loss in the Travers Stakes by winning the Breeders’ Cup, they are also contending with the fact that he will leave their barn forever shortly after the race.
snippet: As American Pharoah’s connections look to bounce back from his loss in the Travers Stakes by winning the Breeders’ Cup, they are also contending with the fact that he will leave their barn forever shortly after the race.
